analysis.description:
TokenTimeLock.releaseFirst (/unique_chucks/5/0xc46c275695edc95c645133124eb13601507863e4.sol#55-64) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,amountFirst) (/unique_chucks/5/0xc46c275695edc95c645133124eb13601507863e4.sol#63-64)

TokenTimeLock.releaseSecond (/unique_chucks/5/0xc46c275695edc95c645133124eb13601507863e4.sol#64-75) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,amountSecond) (/unique_chucks/5/0xc46c275695edc95c645133124eb13601507863e4.sol#74-75)

Crowdsale.mint (/unique_chucks/5/0xc46c275695edc95c645133124eb13601507863e4.sol#291-334) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IToken(_erc20OrEth).transferFrom(msg.sender,beneficiary,transferTokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0xc46c275695edc95c645133124eb13601507863e4.sol#326-331)

Crowdsale.bonusBase should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xc46c275695edc95c645133124eb13601507863e4.sol#155-157)
